(Original) Doha Cornish is the most popular tourist destination in Qatar.The ancient city civilization of Qatar was built around the Doha Corniche on the shores of the Arabian Sea,It was a center for fishing, pearl extraction, many of the establishments in modern Qatar are here with the old market Suk Waqif Now, People come here to enjoy the fresh air of the sea and relaxing...
